doc:
John Berry (film director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Berry_(film_director) 0 John Berry (September 6, 1917 – November 29, 1999) was an American film director, who went into self-exile in France when his career was interrupted by the Hollywood blacklist. John_Berry ( September_6_,_1917 – November_29_,_1999 ) was an_American_film_director , who went into self-exile in France when his_career was_interrupted by the_Hollywood_blacklist .
